org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl

Class CudaCachingZeroProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl.CudaDirectProvider
      • org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl.CudaCachingZeroProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CudaFullCachingProvider

    public class CudaCachingZeroProvider
extends CudaDirectProvider
implements MemoryProvider
    This is MemoryProvider implementation, that adds cache for memory reuse purposes. Only host memory is cached for future reuse. If some memory chunk gets released via allocator, it'll be probably saved for future reused within same JVM process.

      • malloc

        public PointersPair malloc(AllocationShape shape,
                  AllocationPoint point,
                  AllocationStatus location)
        This method provides PointersPair to memory chunk specified by AllocationShape PLEASE NOTE: This method can actually ignore malloc request, and give out previously cached free memory chunk with equal shape.
        Specified by:
        malloc in interface MemoryProvider
        Overrides:
        malloc in class CudaDirectProvider
        Parameters:
        shape - shape of desired memory chunk
        point - target AllocationPoint structure
        location - either HOST or DEVICE
        Returns:

        public void free(AllocationPoint point)
